thread.title: Jacquelyn
thread.title_full: PlantShed New York Flowers reviewed by Jacquelyn

author: Jacquelyn
title: Jacquelyn
text: Looking online for florist selections was a frustrating experience for me in the past. I wanted something more modern and special than I was finding online and I wanted to be able to order flowers with ease. PlantShed New York Flowers was the solution to my problem. First, let me say, the designs are fabulous! Artfully arranged with an elegant and unique presentation, the flowers appear to be much more costly than they are. The website was easy to deal with and all aspects of ordering, delivery, cost and payment were clearly laid out and simple to accomplish. I received and Email promptly when my order was delivered, so I knew right away that the mission was accomplished. I look forward to using PlantShed for future gifts of flowers in NYC.
